title: Orc
contents: property | Senses | darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 10
description | Aggressive | As a bonus action, the ore can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.
description | Greataxe | Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1 d12 + 3) s lashing damage.
description | Javelin | Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
